channel.title: I need urgent help, people are luring...!
channel.description: I have a hangout area in the catherby island, but the ladder takes you to the wilderness, now people are luring to go down there.... How do I disable it..? In other words, break it..

or make it non wildy by doing this >

[code] public boolean nonWild() {
if ((absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <= 3431)
|| (absX >= 3300 && absX <= 3311 && absY >= 9198 && absY <= 9192)
|| heightLevel == 1) {

        return true;
    } else {
        return false;
    }[/code]

item.title: I need urgent help, people are luring...!
item.dc:creator: @Project_Evolution Project Evolution
item.description:
@Project_Evolution wrote:

Ok, there’s two methods of deleting ladder’s.

~Deleting Ladder’s using Object.CFG~

Ok, so get the coordinate’s for the object and go into your Object.CFG. Put in Control + F and in the box put in the coordinate’s seperated by a space. Once you find that the object matches the ID and the coordinate’s. Just remove it, then save, compile and run.

Here’s a quick format,

object = 2096	2626	3131	1

By the way, that’s just an example.

~Deleting Object’s using Client.java~

First go into client.java and search for,

makeGlobalObject

You should see a whole bunch of object’s, coordinate’s and ID’s. Find the correct object’s and remove it.

Read full topic
